text: Polyrhaphis belti is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Hovore and McCarty in 1998. It is known from Honduras, Costa Rica, Guatemala, Ecuador, Nicaragua, Colombia, and Panama.BioLib.cz - Polyrhaphis belti. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1998
title: Polyrhaphis belti
